ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Post from Abashi regarding archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Charm him before you hand in the note.  This is a pretty common tactic for any quest where the questgiver is KoS.  I ve done this several times, including with
ygData.messageBody:
Charm him before you hand in the note. This is a pretty common tactic for
any quest where the questgiver is KoS. I've done this several times,
including with Mahlin, and it works fine.


Elwyn <Da`Kor>
60 Virtuoso, Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher M Andrews [mailto:cmandy_drew@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 04, 2000 1:09 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Post from Abashi regarding archery

on another note... has anyone started their epic quest? or a better question
yet, has anyone attempted to give Maligar the note to him? well seeing he's
kos, it makes it a challenge.
<clipped>
so now i have no note (not impossible to get again, just not worth it)...
but was wondering if you need to have him under charm,like gix in commons,
to get the note for thex mallet quest. if anyone has the note, or is about
to get it, inform us of your success, not a carbon copy of this =)

Pava Rahti
Cazic Thule
